title: 求一份玩家基础权限资源
author: 黎明.
txt_content:
本帖最后由 黎明. 于 2020-1-25 13:48 编辑 

求一份玩家基础权限资源
就是包括了/spawn这类最基础的权限= =

replies.author: AzureHanChen
replies.txt_content:
essentials.build
essentials.sethome
essentials.home
essentials.tpa
essentials.back
essentials.msg
essentials.tpacancel
essentials.tpaccept

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
权限一般插件会默认给玩家的。

得看你要是神秘插件的基础权限

replies.author: 炫宙菌
